ai_highlights.headline: Alphabet pursuing $16 billion funding for Waymo
ai_highlights.summary: Alphabet is reportedly seeking a massive $16 billion funding round for its self-driving unit Waymo, aiming for a valuation of $110 billion, highlighting continued confidence in autonomous driving AI.

ai_highlights.headline: Google's Project Genie attracts gaming industry interest
ai_highlights.summary: Google's generative AI initiative, Project Genie, is gaining traction in the gaming sector, potentially transforming how interactive environments and assets are created.

market_watch.summary: AI hardware and autonomous driving investments drive market sentiment.

items.news: Stock at $188.52. Nvidia is poised for growth as it reportedly receives approval to sell H200 AI accelerators in China. Earnings report scheduled for Feb 25.
Stock at $338.53. Focus on Waymo's potential $110B valuation and momentum around Gemini and Project Genie.

global_tech.headline: Nvidia to resume major chip sales in China
global_tech.summary: Approvals for selling H200 AI accelerators in China could significantly enhance Nvidia's revenue projections and ease geopolitical supply chain tensions.
